name: Hearth Run
description:
This is Hearth Run, a solo project for the Kindred Games Game Jam #5

The scene begins with a party being thrown by the penguin workers at one of Santa's many present factories, but the party goes horribly wrong with an attack by angry snowmen.

Snowmen are attacking your penguin party. Many of your friends are still wandering around blindfolded trying to pin a tail on something but not you....for some reason. While the mass-produced tin soldiers battle against the snowmen, do your best to keep the fire fueled and stay alive!

Version 1.4 Is now available. Fixed minor bug that prevented exit screen from appearing after the player wins.
